TopicTitle: I'm trying to get RSS and RO, but then it keeps saying “Kopernicus was not able to load the custom planetary system due to an exception in the loading process”

Articles.Content: So uh, I'm kind of bored of the normal KSP so I decided to get RSS and RO (like I said in the title) So, I went over to download the mods and etc etc along with adding it to CKAN and stuff - however whenever I loaded the game pretty much nothing changed, I even removed the previous mods in the gamedata and such. (greatly appreciate for the help since I've also never did this before)

On 3/25/2022 at 8:18 AM, 05x_3 said:

I went over to download the mods and etc etc along with adding it to CKAN and stuff

I am curious what you mean by this. Did you manually download the mods and then import them into CKAN?

I recommend doing a clean install, and then installing RSS + RO from CKAN itself, as it will automatically install all of the required dependencies. It can be easy to mess up if you download things manually.
